value.title: Apple avoids “AI” hype at WWDC keynote by baking ML into products
value.excerpt: Amid notable new products like the Apple Silicon Mac Pro and the Apple Vision Pro revealed at Monday's WWDC 2023 keynote event, Apple presenters never once mentioned the term "AI," a notable omission given that its competitors like Microsoft and Google have been heavily focusing on generative AI at the moment.
